## Simulation of Simulate the first 20 letters (vowel/consonant) of the Pushkin poem Markov chain



```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}

run.mc.sim <- function(P, num.iters = 100) {
  
  
  num.states <- nrow(P)
  
  
  states <- numeric(num.iters)
  
  
  states[1] <- sample(1:num.states, 1)  
  
  
  for(t in 2:num.iters) {
    
    p <- P[states[t-1], ]
    
    states[t] <- which(rmultinom(1, 1, p) == 1)
  }
  
  return(states)
}

##setup transition matrix
P <- matrix(c(0.128, 0.872,   
              0.663, 0.337), 
            nrow = 2, byrow = TRUE)


#P


num.chains <- 1 
num.iterations <- 20  

# defined the matrix of to stor the state
chain.states <- matrix(NA, ncol = num.chains, nrow = num.iterations)

# Simulate the chain(s)
for(c in seq_len(num.chains)) {
  chain.states[,c] <- run.mc.sim(P, num.iters = num.iterations)
}

# Print the simulated sequence of vowels (1) and consonants (2)
#print(chain.states)


matplot(chain.states, cex = 12, pch = 19, type = 'l', lty = 1, col = 1:5, ylim = c(0, 3), 
        ylab = 'State (1=Vowel, 2=Consonant)', xlab = 'Time')
abline(h = 1, lty = 3)  
abline(h = 2, lty = 3)

```
